analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/39/0xf605a76d2fb440deccd84625c686d754d2614eab.sol:
	Contract HeliosToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/39/0xf605a76d2fb440deccd84625c686d754d2614eab.sol#248-249)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/39/0xf605a76d2fb440deccd84625c686d754d2614eab.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/39/0xf605a76d2fb440deccd84625c686d754d2614eab.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/39/0xf605a76d2fb440deccd84625c686d754d2614eab.sol#75-76) is not in mixedCase
